   21: %%
   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Purpose: Test application config
   24: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: 
   26: -module(megaco_examples_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: -export([
   29:          suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   30: 	 init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1, 
   31:          init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2,
   32: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2, 
   33: 
   34:          simple/1,
   35:          
   36:          meas/1,
   37:          mstone1/1,
   38:          mstone2/1
   39: 
   40:         ]).
   41: 
   42: 
   43: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   44: -include("megaco_test_lib.hrl").
   45: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco.hrl").
   46: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco_message_v1.hrl").
   47: 
   48: -define(TEST_VERBOSITY, debug).
   49: 
   50: 
   51: %%======================================================================
   52: %% Common Test interface functions
   53: %%======================================================================
   54: 
   55: suite() -> 
   56:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   57: 
   58: all() -> 
   59:     [
   60:      simple,
   61:      {group, meas}
   62:     ].
   63: 
   64: groups() -> 
   65:     [
   66:      {meas, [], meas_cases()}
   67:     ].
   68: 
   69: meas_cases() ->
   70:     [
   71:      meas,
   72:      mstone1,
   73:      mstone2
   74:     ].
   75: 
   76: 
   77: 
   78: %%
   79: %% -----
   80: %%
   81: 
   82: init_per_suite(suite) ->
   83:     [];
   84: init_per_suite(doc) ->
   85:     [];
   86: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
   87: 
   88:     ?ANNOUNCE_SUITE_INIT(),
   89: 
   90:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
   91:       "~n      Config: ~p"
   92:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
   93: 
   94:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
   95:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
   96:             SKIP;
   97: 
   98:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
   99: 
  100:             %% We need a (local) monitor on this node also
  101:             megaco_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  102: 
  103:             p("init_per_suite -> end when"
  104:               "~n      Config: ~p"
  105:               "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config1, erlang:nodes()]),
  106: 
  107:             Config1
  108:     end.
  109: 
  110: end_per_suite(suite) -> [];
  111: end_per_suite(doc) -> [];
  112: end_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  113: 
  114:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  115:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  116:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  117: 
  118:     megaco_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  119:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  120: 
  121:     p("end_per_suite -> end when"
  122:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  123: 
  124:     Config1.
  125: 
  126: 
  127: %%
  128: %% -----
  129: %%
  130: 
  131: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  132:     Config.
  133: 
  134: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  135:     Config.
  136: 
  137: 
  138: %%
  139: %% -----
  140: %%
  141: 
  142: init_per_testcase(simple = Case, Config) ->
  143: 
  144:     p("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  145:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  146:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  147: 
  148:     megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  149: 
  150:     put(dbg,true),
  151:     purge_example_simple(),
  152:     load_example_simple(),
  153:     megaco:enable_trace(max, io),
  154: 
  155:     megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config);
  156: 
  157: init_per_testcase(meas = Case, Config) ->
  158: 
  159:     p("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  160:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  161:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  162: 
  163:     case megaco_flex_scanner:is_enabled() of
  164:         true ->
  165:             megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  166:             init_per_testcase_meas(Case, example_meas_meas_modules(), Config);
  167:         false ->
  168:             ?SKIP(flex_scanner_not_enabled)
  169:     end;
  170: 
  171: init_per_testcase(mstone1 = Case, Config) ->
  172: 
  173:     p("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  174:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  175:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  176: 
  177:     case megaco_flex_scanner:is_enabled() of
  178:         true ->
  179:             megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  180:             init_per_testcase_meas(Case, example_meas_mstone1_modules(), Config);
  181:         false ->
  182:             ?SKIP(flex_scanner_not_enabled)
  183:     end;
  184: 
  185: init_per_testcase(mstone2 = Case, Config) ->
  186: 
  187:     p("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  188:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  189:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  190: 
  191:     case megaco_flex_scanner:is_enabled() of
  192:         true ->
  193:             megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  194:             init_per_testcase_meas(Case, example_meas_mstone2_modules(), Config);
  195:         false ->
  196:             ?SKIP(flex_scanner_not_enabled)
  197:     end.
  198: 
  199: 
  200: init_per_testcase_meas(Case, Mods, Config) ->
  201:     purge_example(Mods),
  202:     load_example_meas(),
  203: 
  204:     p("try start worker node"),
  205:     try start_unique_node(Case) of
  206:         WorkerNode ->
  207:             megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, [{worker_node, WorkerNode} | Config])
  208:     catch
  209:         _:{failed_starting_node, NodePre, Reason} ->
  210:             {skip, ?F("Failed starting node ~p: ~p", [NodePre, Reason])}
  211:     end.
  212:     
  213: 
  214: 
  215: end_per_testcase(simple = Case, Config) ->
  216: 
  217:     p("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  218:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  219:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  220: 
  221:     p("system events during test: "
  222:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  223: 
  224:     purge_example_simple(),
  225:     erase(dbg),
  226:     megaco:disable_trace(),
  227: 
  228:     megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config);
  229: 
  230: end_per_testcase(meas = Case, Config) ->
  231: 
  232:     p("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  233:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  234:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  235: 
  236:     p("system events during test: "
  237:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  238: 
  239:     end_per_testcase_meas(Case, example_meas_meas_modules(), Config);
  240: 
  241: end_per_testcase(mstone1 = Case, Config) ->
  242: 
  243:     p("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  244:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  245:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  246: 
  247:     p("system events during test: "
  248:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  249: 
  250:     end_per_testcase_meas(Case, example_meas_mstone1_modules(), Config);
  251: 
  252: end_per_testcase(mstone2 = Case, Config) ->
  253: 
  254:     p("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  255:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  256:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  257: 
  258:     p("system events during test: "
  259:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  260: 
  261:     end_per_testcase_meas(Case, example_meas_mstone2_modules(), Config).
  262: 
  263: end_per_testcase_meas(Case, Mods, Config) ->
  264:     purge_example(Mods),
  265:     case lists:keysearch(worker_node, 1, Config) of
  266:         {value, {worker_node, WorkerNode}} ->
  267:             ?STOP_NODE(WorkerNode),
  268:             megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, lists:keydelete(worker_node, 1, Config));
  269:         false ->
  270:             megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config)
  271:     end.
  272: 
  273: 
  274: load_example_simple() ->
  275:     load_example(simple).
  276: 
  277: load_example_meas() ->
  278:     load_example(meas).
  279: 
  280: load_example(Example) ->
  281:     case code:lib_dir(megaco) of
  282: 	{error, Reason} ->
  283: 	    {error, Reason};
  284: 	Dir ->
  285: 	    ExampleDir = filename:join([Dir, examples, Example]),
  286: 	    case code:add_path(ExampleDir) of
  287: 		true ->
  288: 		    ok;
  289: 		{error, What} ->
  290: 		    error_logger:error_msg("failed adding examples ~p path: "
  291: 					   "~n   ~p"
  292: 					   "~n", [Example, What]),
  293: 		    {error, {failed_add_path, Example, What}}
  294: 	    end
  295:     end.
  296: 
  297: 
  298: example_simple_modules() ->
  299:     [
  300:      megaco_simple_mg,
  301:      megaco_simple_mgc
  302:     ].
  303: 
  304: purge_example_simple() ->
  305:     purge_example(example_simple_modules()).
  306: 
  307: 
  308: example_meas_meas_modules() ->
  309:     [
  310:      megaco_codec_meas,
  311:      megaco_codec_transform
  312:     ].
  313: 
  314: example_meas_mstone1_modules() ->
  315:     [
  316:      megaco_codec_mstone1,
  317:      megaco_codec_mstone_lib,
  318:      megaco_codec_transform
  319:     ].
  320: 
  321: example_meas_mstone2_modules() ->
  322:     [
  323:      megaco_codec_mstone2,
  324:      megaco_codec_mstone_lib,
  325:      megaco_codec_transform
  326:     ].
  327: 
  328: 
  329: purge_example(Mods) ->
  330:     case code:lib_dir(megaco) of
  331: 	{error, Reason} ->
  332: 	    {error, Reason};
  333: 	_Dir ->
  334: 	    [code:purge(M) || M <- Mods]
  335:     end.
  336: 
  337: 
  338: 
  339: %% ------------------ simple ------------------------
  340: 
  341: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  342: 
  343: simple(suite) ->
  344:     [];
  345: simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  346:     Pre  = fun() ->
  347:                    d("simple -> "
  348:                      "create (3) node name(s) (includes the own node)"),
  349:                    %% We actually need two *new* nodes,
  350:                    %% but the function includes the own node,
  351:                    %% so we need to ask for one more.
  352:                    [_Local, MGC, MG] = ?MK_NODES(3),
  353:                    Nodes = [MGC, MG],
  354: 
  355:                    d("simple -> start nodes: "
  356:                      "~n      ~p", [Nodes]),
  357:                    ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  358:                    Nodes
  359:            end,
  360:     Case = fun(Nodes) ->
  361:                    do_simple(Config, Nodes)
  362:            end,
  363:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  364:                    d("simple -> stop nodes"
  365:                      "~n      ~p", [Nodes]),
  366:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes)
  367:            end,
  368:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
  369: 
  370: 
  371: do_simple(_Config, [MGC, MG]) ->
  372:     MGCId = "MGC",
  373:     MGId  = "MG",
  374: 
  375:     d("simple -> MGC proxy start (on ~p)", [MGC]),
  376:     MGCProxy = megaco_test_lib:proxy_start(MGC, "MGC"),
  377:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  378: 
  379:     d("simple -> MG proxy start (on ~p)", [MG]),
  380:     MGProxy  = megaco_test_lib:proxy_start(MG, "MG"),
  381:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  382: 
  383:     MegacoStart       = fun() -> megaco:start() end,
  384:     MegacoStartVerify =
  385: 	 fun(_, ok)    -> ok;
  386: 	    (Id, Else) -> ?ERROR({failed_starting_megaco, Id, Else})
  387: 	 end,
  388: 
  389:     d("simple -> start MGC megaco"),
  390:     exec(MGCProxy, MGCId, MegacoStart,
  391: 	 fun(Res) -> MegacoStartVerify(MGCId, Res) end),
  392:     %% ?APPLY(MGCProxy, fun() -> ok = megaco:start() end),
  393:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  394:     
  395:     d("simple -> start MG megaco"),
  396:     exec(MGProxy, MGId, MegacoStart,
  397: 	 fun(Res) -> MegacoStartVerify(MGId, Res) end),
  398:     %% ?APPLY(MGProxy, fun() -> ok = megaco:start() end),
  399:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  400:     
  401:     d("simple -> start mgc"),
  402:     start_mgc(MGCProxy),
  403:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  404: 
  405:     d("simple -> verify MGC info (no mg)"),
  406:     info(MGCProxy),
  407:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  408: 
  409:     d("simple -> verify MGC system_info(users) (no mg)"),
  410:     users(MGCProxy),
  411:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  412: 
  413:     d("simple -> start mg"),
  414:     start_mg(MGProxy),
  415:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  416: 
  417:     d("simple -> verify MGC info (mg)"),
  418:     info(MGCProxy),
  419:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  420: 
  421:     d("simple -> verify MGC system_info(users) (mg)"),
  422:     users(MGCProxy),
  423:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  424: 
  425:     d("simple -> verify MG info"),
  426:     info(MGProxy),
  427:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  428: 
  429:     d("simple -> verify MG system_info(users)"),
  430:     users(MGProxy),
  431:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  432: 
  433:     d("simple -> stop mgc"),
  434:     exec(MGCProxy, MGCId,
  435: 	 fun() -> megaco_simple_mgc:stop() end,
  436: 	 fun([_]) -> ok;
  437: 	    (L) when is_list(L) ->
  438: 		 ?ERROR({invalid_users, L});
  439: 	    (X) ->
  440: 		 ?ERROR({invalid_result, X})
  441: 	 end),
  442:     %% ?VERIFY(5, length()),
  443:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  444: 
  445:     d("simple -> verify MGC info (no mgc)"),
  446:     info(MGCProxy),
  447:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  448: 
  449:     d("simple -> verify MG info (no mgc)"),
  450:     info(MGProxy),
  451:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  452: 
  453:     d("simple -> verify MGC system_info(users) (no mgc)",[]),
  454:     users(MGCProxy),
  455:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  456: 
  457:     d("simple -> verify MG system_info(users) (no mgc)",[]),
  458:     users(MGProxy),
  459:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  460: 
  461:     MegacoStop       = fun() -> megaco:stop() end,
  462:     MegacoStopVerify =
  463: 	 fun(_, ok)    -> ok;
  464: 	    (Id, Else) -> ?ERROR({failed_stop_megaco, Id, Else})
  465: 	 end,
  466: 
  467:     d("simple -> stop MG megaco",[]),
  468:     exec(MGProxy, MGId, MegacoStop,
  469: 	 fun(Res) -> MegacoStopVerify(MGId, Res) end),
  470:     %% ?VERIFY(ok, megaco:stop()),
  471:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  472: 
  473:     d("simple -> stop MGC megaco",[]),
  474:     exec(MGCProxy, MGCId, MegacoStop,
  475: 	 fun(Res) -> MegacoStopVerify(MGCId, Res) end),
  476:     %% ?VERIFY(ok, megaco:stop()),
  477:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  478: 
  479:     d("simple -> kill (exit) MG Proxy: ~p", [MGProxy]),
  480:     MGProxy ! {stop, self(), normal},
  481:     receive
  482: 	{'EXIT', MGProxy, _} ->
  483: 	    d("simple -> MG Proxy terminated"),
  484: 	    ok
  485:     end,
  486: 
  487:     d("simple -> kill (exit) MGC Proxy: ~p", [MGCProxy]),
  488:     MGCProxy ! {stop, self(), normal},
  489:     receive
  490: 	{'EXIT', MGCProxy, _} ->
  491: 	    d("simple -> MGC Proxy terminated"),
  492: 	    ok
  493:     end,
  494: 
  495:     d("simple -> done", []),
  496:     ok.
  497: 
  498: 
  499: exec(Proxy, Id, Cmd, Verify) ->
  500:     ?APPLY(Proxy, Cmd),
  501:     receive
  502: 	{res, Id, Res} ->
  503: 	    Verify(Res)
  504:     end.
  505: 
  506: 
  507: start_mgc(Proxy) ->
  508:     ?APPLY(Proxy,
  509: 	   fun() ->
  510: 		   try megaco_simple_mgc:start() of
  511: 		       Res ->
  512: 			   Res
  513: 		   catch
  514: 		       C:E:S ->
  515: 			   {error, {{catched, C, E, S}}, code:get_path()}
  516: 		   end
  517: 	   end),
  518:     receive
  519: 	{res, _, {ok, MgcAll}} when is_list(MgcAll) ->
  520: 	    MgcBad = [MgcRes || MgcRes <- MgcAll, element(1, MgcRes) /= ok],
  521: 	    ?VERIFY([], MgcBad),
  522: 	    ok;
  523: 	Error ->
  524: 	    ?ERROR(Error)
  525:     end.
  526: 
  527: 
  528: start_mg(Proxy) ->
  529:     ?APPLY(Proxy, fun() -> 
  530: 			  try megaco_simple_mg:start() of
  531: 			      Res ->
  532: 				  Res
  533: 			  catch
  534: 			      C:E:S ->
  535: 				  {error, {{catched, C, E, S}}, code:get_path()}
  536: 			  end
  537: 		  end),
  538:     receive
  539: 	{res, _, MGs} when is_list(MGs) andalso (length(MGs) =:= 4) ->
  540: 	    verify_mgs(MGs);
  541: 	Error ->
  542: 	    ?ERROR(Error)
  543:     end.
  544: 
  545: verify_mgs(MGs) ->
  546:     Verify = 
  547: 	fun({_MgMid, {TransId, Res}}) when (TransId =:= 1) ->
  548: 		case Res of
  549: 		    {ok, [AR]} when is_record(AR, 'ActionReply') ->
  550: 			case AR#'ActionReply'.commandReply of
  551: 			    [{serviceChangeReply, SCR}] ->
  552: 				case SCR#'ServiceChangeReply'.serviceChangeResult of
  553: 				    {serviceChangeResParms, MgcMid} 
  554: 				      when (MgcMid =/= asn1_NOVALUE) ->
  555: 					ok;
  556: 				    Error ->
  557: 					?ERROR(Error)
  558: 				end;
  559: 			    Error ->
  560: 				?ERROR(Error)
  561: 			end;
  562: 		    Error ->
  563: 			?ERROR(Error)
  564: 		end;
  565: 	   (Error) ->
  566: 		?ERROR(Error)
  567: 	end,
  568:     lists:map(Verify, MGs).
  569:     
  570:     
  571: info(Proxy) ->
  572:     ?APPLY(Proxy,
  573: 	   fun() ->
  574: 		   try megaco:info() of
  575: 		       I -> I
  576: 		   catch
  577: 		       C:E:S ->
  578: 			   {error, {C, E, S}}
  579: 		   end
  580: 	   end),
  581:     receive
  582: 	{res, _, Info} when is_list(Info) ->
  583: 	    ?LOG("Ok, ~p~n", [Info]);
  584: 	{res, _, Error} ->
  585: 	    ?ERROR(Error)
  586:     end.
  587: 
  588: 
  589: users(Proxy) ->
  590:     ?APPLY(Proxy,
  591: 	   fun() ->
  592: 		   try megaco:system_info(users) of
  593: 		       I -> I
  594: 		   catch
  595: 		       C:E:S ->
  596: 			   {error, {C, E, S}}
  597: 		   end
  598: 	   end),
  599:     receive
  600: 	{res, _, Info} when is_list(Info) ->
  601: 	    ?LOG("Ok, ~p~n", [Info]);
  602: 	{res, _, Error} ->
  603: 	    ?ERROR(Error)
  604:     end.
  605: 
  606: 
  607: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  608: 
  609: %% ------------------ meas:meas ------------------------
  610: 
  611: meas(suite) ->
  612:     [];
  613: meas(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  614:     Pre  = fun() ->
  615:                    MFactor = ?config(megaco_factor, Config),
  616:                    {Time, Factor} =
  617:                        if
  618:                            (MFactor =:= 1) ->
  619:                                {3,  100};
  620:                            (MFactor =:= 2) ->
  621:                                {4,  100};
  622:                            (MFactor =:= 3) ->
  623:                                {4,  200};
  624:                            (MFactor =:= 4) ->
  625:                                {5,  300};
  626:                            (MFactor =:= 5) ->
  627:                                {5,  400};
  628:                            (MFactor =:= 6) ->
  629:                                {6,  500};
  630:                            true ->
  631:                                {10, 600}
  632:                        end,
  633:                    p("Run with: "
  634:                      "~n      Timetrap: ~p mins"
  635:                      "~n      Factor:   ~p", [Time, Factor]),
  636:                    ct:timetrap(?MINS(Time)),
  637:                    WorkerNode = ?config(worker_node, Config),
  638:                    {Factor, WorkerNode}
  639:            end,
  640:     Opts = #{verbose => false},
  641:     Case = fun({Factor, WorkerNode}) ->
  642:                    do_meas(WorkerNode, megaco_codec_meas, start, [Factor, Opts])
  643:            end,
  644:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  645:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
  646: 
  647: do_meas(Node, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  648:     F = fun() ->
  649:                 exit( rpc:call(Node, Mod, Func, Args) )
  650:         end,
  651:     p("start worker process"),
  652:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(F),
  653:     p("await completion"),
  654:     receive
  655:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid,
  656:          {error, {failed_loading_flex_scanner_driver, Reason}}} ->
  657:             p("<ERROR> worker process failed loading flex scanner: "
  658:               "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
  659:             ?SKIP(Reason);
  660:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {error, Reason}} ->
  661:             p("<ERROR> worker process terminated: "
  662:               "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
  663:             ?FAIL(Reason);
  664:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {badrpc, BadRpc}} ->
  665:             p("<ERROR> worker process terminated - badrpc: "
  666:               "~n      ~p", [BadRpc]),
  667:             ?FAIL(BadRpc);
  668:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
  669:             p("worker process terminated: "
  670:               "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
  671:             ok;
  672: 
  673:         {'EXIT', TCPid, {timetrap_timeout = R, TCTimeout, TCSTack}} ->
  674:             p("received timetrap timeout (~w ms) from ~p => "
  675:               "Kill executor process"
  676:               "~n      TC Stack: ~p", [TCTimeout, TCPid, TCSTack]),
  677:             exit(Pid, kill),
  678:             ?SKIP(R)
  679:     end,
  680:     ok.
  681: 
  682: 
  683: 
  684: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  685: 
  686: %% ------------------ meas:mstone1 ------------------------
  687: 
  688: mstone1(suite) ->
  689:     [];
  690: mstone1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  691:     Pre  = fun() ->
  692:                    %% The point of this is to make sure we
  693:                    %% utilize as much of the host as possible...
  694:                    RunTime   = 1, % Minute
  695:                    NumSched  =
  696:                        try erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of N -> N
  697:                        catch _:_:_ -> 1
  698:                        end,
  699:                    Factor    = 1 + (NumSched div 12),
  700:                    ct:timetrap(?MINS(RunTime + 1)),
  701:                    {RunTime, Factor, ?config(worker_node, Config)}
  702:            end,
  703:     Case = fun({RunTime, Factor, WorkerNode}) ->
  704:                    Mod  = megaco_codec_mstone1,
  705:                    Func = start,
  706:                    Args = [RunTime, Factor],
  707:                    p("Run with: "
  708:                      "~n      Run Time: ~p min(s)"
  709:                      "~n      Factor:   ~p", [RunTime, Factor]),
  710:                    do_meas(WorkerNode, Mod, Func, Args)
  711:            end,
  712:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  713:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
  714:                    
  715: 
  716: 
  717: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  718: 
  719: %% ------------------ meas:mstone2 ------------------------
  720: 
  721: mstone2(suite) ->
  722:     [];
  723: mstone2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  724:     Pre  = fun() ->
  725:                    RunTime  = 1, % Minutes
  726:                    NumSched =
  727:                        try erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of N -> N
  728:                        catch _:_:_ -> 1
  729:                        end,
  730:                    Factor   = 1 + (NumSched div 12),
  731:                    ct:timetrap(?MINS(RunTime + 1)),
  732:                    {Factor, RunTime, ?config(worker_node, Config)}
  733:            end,
  734:     Case = fun({Factor, RunTime, WorkerNode}) ->
  735:                    Mode = standard,
  736:                    Mod  = megaco_codec_mstone2,
  737:                    Func = start,
  738:                    Args = [Factor, RunTime, Mode],
  739:                    p("Run with: "
  740:                      "~n      Factor:   ~p"
  741:                      "~n      Run Time: ~p min(s)"
  742:                      "~n      Mode:     ~p", [Factor, RunTime, Mode]),
  743:                    do_meas(WorkerNode, Mod, Func, Args)
  744:            end,
  745:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  746:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
  747: 
  748: 
  749: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  750: 
  751: start_unique_node(Pre) ->
  752:     start_unique_node(Pre, 3).
  753: 
  754: start_unique_node(Pre, 0) -> 
  755:     ?FAIL({failed_starting_node, Pre, tries});
  756: start_unique_node(Pre, N) when is_integer(N) andalso (N > 0) ->
  757:     Node = unique_node_name(Pre),
  758:     try ?START_NODE(Node, true) of
  759:         ok ->
  760:             Node
  761:     catch
  762:         exit:{skip, {fatal, {node_already_running, _}, _, _}} ->
  763:             ?SLEEP(100),
  764:             start_unique_node(Pre, N-1);
  765:         exit:{skip, {fatal, {cannot_start_node, _, Reason}, _, _}} ->
  766:             ?FAIL({failed_starting_node, Pre, Reason})
  767:     end.
  768: 
  769: 
  770: unique_node_name(Pre) ->
  771:     [_, Host] = string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()), [$@]),
  772:     list_to_atom(?F("~s@~s", [?UNIQUE(Pre), Host])).
  773: 
  774: 
  775: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  776: 
  777: try_tc(TCName, Pre, Case, Post) ->
  778:     try_tc(TCName, "EX-TESTER", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Pre, Case, Post).
  779: 
  780: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post) ->
  781:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post).
  782: 
  783: 
  784: 
  785: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  786: 
  787: p(F) ->
  788:     p(F, []).
  789: 
  790: p(F, A) ->
  791:     p(get(sname), F, A).
  792: 
  793: p(S, F, A) when is_list(S) ->
  794:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ~s ***" 
  795: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
  796: 	      [?FTS(), self(), S | A]);
  797: p(_S, F, A) ->
  798:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p *** "
  799: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
  800: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).
  801: 
  802: 
  803: d(F) ->
  804:     d(F, []).
  805: d(F, A) ->
  806:     d(get(dbg), F, A).
  807: 
  808: d(true, F, A) ->
  809:     io:format("DBG: ~s " ++ F ++ "~n", [?FTS() | A]);
  810: d(_, _F, _A) ->
  811:     ok.
